name: Chakra Simulator
description:
Story!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It Was A Night Like All Others,I Was Coding This Game For 30 Minutes But I Couldnt Fix The Problem With Auto Chakra So I Tried For 4 Hours And Finally Did It!

Type Your Highest Chakra In The Comments!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Chakra Simulator!

Controls:Mouse,WASD To Move,C To See Your Characters,X To Hide Character Tab,P To Switch Around Your Attacks  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dec 14,:V.1:Uchiha Clan Basic,Akimichi Clan Basic

Dec 13,:V Update:Naruto,Charcters Tab Show If C Pressed,SECRET GOLDEN NARUTO Unlocks At 134,000 Chakra,Rasegan Attack!

Dec 17,:New Characters Unlock At Certain Levels,You Gain XP From Getting Chakra Or Using Attacks,NEW Attacks For The Characters(Expert Modes Soon)New Charcters Are:Rock Lee,Sasuke(Gold Mode Soon)New Attacks Are:TakeOff And Punch

Dec 17,:FIXED GAME

Dec 18,CHRISTMAS UPDATE:Reskinned Ground,Yen Feature,Water And Fire Justu AND SHADOW CLONE TECHNIQUE obtainable using codes Fire For Fire Justu Water For Water Justu And Shadow Clone For Shadow Clone Technique WARNING!THEY COST YEN! You Gain Yen By Leveling Up!
